name: tm93
effect: Teaches wild charge to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Wild Charge to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user shrouds itself in electricity
and smashes into its target.
It also damages the user a little.

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user’s body generates an eerie impulse.
Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s
Sp. Atk stat.
